# Initialize

# Prematch
## Tables


```{r pre_match, results='asis'}

tbl_data<-anal_data
source('R_script/04_Make_Tables.R')
table1<-baseline_tbl
myt_output='HTML'
table1%>%print_mytable()

surv_data<-anal_data
source('R_script/05_Analysis.R')
fig1<-surv_fig1
fig2<-surv_fig2
fig1
fig2

```


# PSM

# Acute IE
